about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: We are an innovative manufacturing and trading company covering the markets of Slovakia, Czech Republic and EU countries. Since 1999, we have been professionally engaged in the production, sale and service of high-quality water treatment systems. We cooperate with global suppliers of components for custom water quality treatment systems. We place great emphasis on expertise and the quality of our supplied equipment.
about.paragraph2: We provide expert consulting, design, installation, and service of water quality treatment systems according to our customers' individual requirements.
about.paragraph3: Since the beginning of our market presence, we have designed and implemented thousands of water treatments for our satisfied clients. Join this group.
